name: G.O.A.T.
description: Created by Scapegoat Genetics and TSL Farms, G.O.A.T. is a hybrid strain that crosses Animal Pie and ACDC. Bursting with fragrant cherry aromas, G.O.A.T. is as flavorful as it is potent. With a 1:1 ratio of CBD:THC, this hybrid is preferred by patients treating pain, multiple sclerosis, and cancer.
descriptionPlain: Created by Scapegoat Genetics and TSL Farms, G.O.A.T. is a hybrid strain that crosses Animal Pie and ACDC. Bursting with fragrant cherry aromas, G.O.A.T. is as flavorful as it is potent. With a 1:1 ratio of CBD:THC, this hybrid is preferred by patients treating pain, multiple sclerosis, and cancer.

highlightedReviews.text: Definitely a quality strain idk about greatest of all time but great none the less. The effects can sneak up on and hit you in the face like an angry ex with a grudge and maybe a frying pan full of gravel. Enjoyed some before bed then a few hours later woke up to get the paper and locked myself out for half hour before realizing the door wasn't locked. Boy was my son embarrassed/confused when the bus passed by with me half naked reading the paper on my porch

Literally only best way I can describe this is, once it hits its you‚Äôll know it sit down and relax and it feels you are laying on a cloud and you feel you‚Äôre becoming one with it. I‚Äôm stoned on it rnüòÇü§ô
I recommend!!!!

articles.title: Your Guide to the Perfect Weekend: Moon Cookies, The Rig Stick, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
My friends, we made it. The long-awaited weekend is here. But two pressing questions remain: How are you going to spend the weekend and which Washington state cannabis products are going to make it the best ever?
The Leafly team (and our industry friends) got together to discuss what our favorites are and how they‚Äôll be enhancing our weekend. Whether you‚Äôre planning to kick back at home or get outside (rain or shine), let us help you branch out so you don‚Äôt have to take a shot in the dark at some new strains, products, and brands.
Browse the Latest Cannabis Products
For Your Weekend Gaming Binge
¬†
Product: GaGa Peanut Butter Cups¬†(10mg) 
Type: Edible
‚ÄúI got myself a Nintendo Switch and the new Zelda game this weekend, and I wanted an edible that would basically cryogenically freeze me to my couch, rendering me unaware of my physical form and immerse me fully in the lush grassy fields of Hyrule. These peanut butter cups by GaGa did just that. I was utterly and completely stoned into oblivion for six to eight hours. The filling tasted more like cannabis than peanut butter, but the experience is what matters most to me.‚Äù ‚Äì Bailey, Leafly Editor
Product: The Clear‚Äôs Golden Goat
Type: Vape Pen Cartridge
‚ÄúThe Clear‚Äôs Golden Goat vape pen from Fweedom Collective tastes fantastic and you don‚Äôt have to hit it as often to get super high ‚Äì meaning more time for my hands to be on the controller while playing Zelda in bed.‚Äù ‚Äì Fermin, Leafly Developer

For Spring Cleaning

Product: Headlight‚Äôs Moon Cookies
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúI tried Moon Cookies flower by Headlight over the weekend. A few puffs in had me motivated to do all the dishes in the sink! A few more puffs and I was motivated to meal plan for the week. I did both and felt happy about it. Moon Cookies: Get your life on track.‚Äù ‚Äì Diana, Leafly Customer Service Specialist
Product: Errl‚Äôs Dutch Treat
Type: Dabbable Oil
‚ÄúDutch Treat is a must-have sativa-dominant hybrid for concentrate consumers seeking quality terpenes and functional effects. Errl‚Äôs Dutch Treat is sweet and pungent, leaving the hallmark ‚Äòdutchy‚Äô flavor spread across the palate. The moderate energy and uplifted mental state make it a perfect companion for cleaning the house, finishing chores, or kicking off the day.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher

For Fueling Creativity

Product: Puffin Farm‚Äôs Dancehall
Type: High-CBD Flower, Sativa
‚ÄúI recommend Puffin Farm‚Äôs Dancehall for playing or listening to music. It‚Äôs called Dancehall for a reason. It makes it so easy to lock in to the sounds, but since it‚Äôs barely got any THC in it, you can stay sharp and remember how your cymbal stand works before you play.‚Äú ‚Äì Saba, Leafly Software Engineer
Product: Private Reserve‚Äôs Pink Cookies
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúWhether I‚Äôm making jewelry, coloring in my adult coloring books, or cutting up pictures for a collage, I‚Äôve found that cannabis always boosts my creativity and makes the activity that much more enjoyable. I tend to prefer hybrids while crafting, since straight sativas can make me anxious. A budtender at Trees Pot Shop recommended a lovely strain, Pink Cookies from Private Reserve, a delightful combination of GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Cherry Pie (already two of my favorite hybrids), and it‚Äôs the perfect blend for relaxation and concentration. I can focus on my crafting with a soothing calmness that envelops you like a happy hug.‚Äù ‚Äì Lisa, Leafly Editor

For Health & Wellness

Product: Ethos CBD Tincture (250mg/bottle)
Type: Tincture 
‚ÄúA dropper of this tincture is good with a cup of coffee to curb anxiety before work, at the end of the day to help relax the body before bed, the morning after a party to help with a hangover, or any time you are seeking general anti-inflammatory effects that won‚Äôt mess with your head.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher
Product: Craft Elixirs Ginger Grass Syrup (60mg THC/bottle)
Type: Infused Syrup
‚ÄúI recently tried Craft Elixir‚Äôs ginger flavored syrup since they were out of my favorite simple syrup. I think I accidentally found a new favorite. The combination of ginger and THC calms my perma-fussy stomach really well. I can dissolve a micro-dose (<5mg) of the elixir in some hot water and sip it for mild nausea and anxiety relief ‚Äì all without a detectable high.‚Äù ‚Äì Bailey, Leafly Editor

For Hiking, Exercise, and Getting Out¬†
Product: The Rig Stick
Type: Portable Dab Pen
‚ÄúI‚Äôm really impressed by The Rig Stick. In my opinion, it‚Äôs a way easier method of dabbing on-the-go than a Nectar Collector or small rig. It requires no water but it doesn‚Äôt taste or feel like doing a dry dab at all!‚Äù ‚Äì Randi, Budtender
Product: Pioneer Nuggets‚Äô Lodi Dodi
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúLodi Dodi by Pioneer Nuggets is my go-to workout strain. A bowl or two before suiting up, and by the time I hit the treadmill my limbs are buzzing with a complementary physical energy. Lodi Dodi adequately hazes my mind alongside these lightening physical effects, allowing the music to transport me into ‚ÄòThe Zone.‚Äô This strain makes the repetition of running in place significantly more enjoyable, and its physical effects seem to improve my overall endurance.‚Äù¬†‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher
Product: Headlight‚Äôs GG4 (f.k.a Gorilla Glue #4) 
Type: Vape Pen Cartridge
‚ÄúHeadlight‚Äôs GG (f.k.a. Gorilla Glue) vape cartridge is great for a busy weekend. Simple and potent dosing make it easy to dial in your effects and its flavor profile stays true to the flower. A couple puffs create an uplifting, focused buzz, perfect before a workout. The pungent, piney flavors will draw you back, and after a few more puffs it‚Äôs time to curl up with a good book or the latest episodes of Planet Earth.‚Äù¬†‚Äì Will, Leafly Digital Content Producer

What‚Äôs the weekend have in store for you? Let us know what we should check out next!
Check Out More¬†Cannabis Products

articles.title: Tips for Growing Golden Goat Cannabis
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Ever wanted to grow your favorite strain? Leafly and Botanicare¬†are teaming up on a series of grow guides that will equip you with all the tips and tricks you need to grow different strains successfully.

Strain Overview: The sativa-dominant Golden Goat gives an energetic, cerebral high that can be intimidating for new users. It‚Äôs a clone-only strain that was accidentally produced by crossing Hawaiian Romulan with Island Sweet Skunk. A popular strain in Colorado, Golden Goat is best known for its strong fruity smell and high THC content.
Grow Techniques: Grow this plant with lots of space for the roots, as they like to stretch and grow big. Golden Goat is a branchy plant, making it ideal for a SOG (sea of green) if you put in the time to train the plant. If growing indoors, allow for stretch.
Flowering Time: 9-10 weeks
Yield: Moderate
Grow Difficulty: Moderate
Climate: Prefers warm temperatures between 70-80 degrees Fahrenheit
Indoor/Outdoor: In a warm climate, grow Golden Goat outdoors in a big pot to see the plant truly take off. When growing indoors, be sure to give your plants plenty of space.
Feeding: Moderate feeding should be adequate. Bud development can be kicked into full gear toward the end of the season by allowing for cooler temperatures and letting the roots receive plenty of oxygen.

name: G.O.A.T.
description: Created by Scapegoat Genetics and TSL Farms, G.O.A.T. is a hybrid strain that crosses Animal Pie and ACDC. Bursting with fragrant cherry aromas, G.O.A.T. is as flavorful as it is potent. With a 1:1 ratio of CBD:THC, this hybrid is preferred by patients treating pain, multiple sclerosis, and cancer.
descriptionPlain: Created by Scapegoat Genetics and TSL Farms, G.O.A.T. is a hybrid strain that crosses Animal Pie and ACDC. Bursting with fragrant cherry aromas, G.O.A.T. is as flavorful as it is potent. With a 1:1 ratio of CBD:THC, this hybrid is preferred by patients treating pain, multiple sclerosis, and cancer.

The effects can sneak up on and hit you in the face like an angry ex with a grudge and maybe a frying pan full of gravel. Enjoyed some before bed then a few hours later woke up to get the paper and locked myself out for half hour before realizing the door wasn't locked. Boy was my son embarrassed/confused when the bus passed by with me half naked reading the paper on my porch

Literally only best way I can describe this is, once it hits its you‚Äôll know it sit down and relax and it feels you are laying on a cloud and you feel you‚Äôre becoming one with it. I‚Äôm stoned on it rnüòÇü§ô
I recommend!!!!

My friends, we made it. The long-awaited weekend is here. But two pressing questions remain: How are you going to spend the weekend and which Washington state cannabis products are going to make it the best ever?
The Leafly team (and our industry friends) got together to discuss what our favorites are and how they‚Äôll be enhancing our weekend. Whether you‚Äôre planning to kick back at home or get outside (rain or shine), let us help you branch out so you don‚Äôt have to take a shot in the dark at some new strains, products, and brands.
Browse the Latest Cannabis Products
For Your Weekend Gaming Binge
¬†
Product: GaGa Peanut Butter Cups¬†(10mg) 
Type: Edible
‚ÄúI got myself a Nintendo Switch and the new Zelda game this weekend, and I wanted an edible that would basically cryogenically freeze me to my couch, rendering me unaware of my physical form and immerse me fully in the lush grassy fields of Hyrule. These peanut butter cups by GaGa did just that. I was utterly and completely stoned into oblivion for six to eight hours. The filling tasted more like cannabis than peanut butter, but the experience is what matters most to me.‚Äù ‚Äì Bailey, Leafly Editor
Product: The Clear‚Äôs Golden Goat
Type: Vape Pen Cartridge
‚ÄúThe Clear‚Äôs Golden Goat vape pen from Fweedom Collective tastes fantastic and you don‚Äôt have to hit it as often to get super high ‚Äì meaning more time for my hands to be on the controller while playing Zelda in bed.‚Äù ‚Äì Fermin, Leafly Developer

For Spring Cleaning

Product: Headlight‚Äôs Moon Cookies
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúI tried Moon Cookies flower by Headlight over the weekend. A few puffs in had me motivated to do all the dishes in the sink! A few more puffs and I was motivated to meal plan for the week. I did both and felt happy about it. Moon Cookies: Get your life on track.‚Äù ‚Äì Diana, Leafly Customer Service Specialist
Product: Errl‚Äôs Dutch Treat
Type: Dabbable Oil
‚ÄúDutch Treat is a must-have sativa-dominant hybrid for concentrate consumers seeking quality terpenes and functional effects. Errl‚Äôs Dutch Treat is sweet and pungent, leaving the hallmark ‚Äòdutchy‚Äô flavor spread across the palate. The moderate energy and uplifted mental state make it a perfect companion for cleaning the house, finishing chores, or kicking off the day.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher

For Fueling Creativity

Product: Puffin Farm‚Äôs Dancehall
Type: High-CBD Flower, Sativa
‚ÄúI recommend Puffin Farm‚Äôs Dancehall for playing or listening to music. It‚Äôs called Dancehall for a reason. It makes it so easy to lock in to the sounds, but since it‚Äôs barely got any THC in it, you can stay sharp and remember how your cymbal stand works before you play.‚Äú ‚Äì Saba, Leafly Software Engineer
Product: Private Reserve‚Äôs Pink Cookies
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúWhether I‚Äôm making jewelry, coloring in my adult coloring books, or cutting up pictures for a collage, I‚Äôve found that cannabis always boosts my creativity and makes the activity that much more enjoyable. I tend to prefer hybrids while crafting, since straight sativas can make me anxious. A budtender at Trees Pot Shop recommended a lovely strain, Pink Cookies from Private Reserve, a delightful combination of GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Cherry Pie (already two of my favorite hybrids), and it‚Äôs the perfect blend for relaxation and concentration. I can focus on my crafting with a soothing calmness that envelops you like a happy hug.‚Äù ‚Äì Lisa, Leafly Editor

For Health & Wellness

Product: Ethos CBD Tincture (250mg/bottle)
Type: Tincture 
‚ÄúA dropper of this tincture is good with a cup of coffee to curb anxiety before work, at the end of the day to help relax the body before bed, the morning after a party to help with a hangover, or any time you are seeking general anti-inflammatory effects that won‚Äôt mess with your head.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher
Product: Craft Elixirs Ginger Grass Syrup (60mg THC/bottle)
Type: Infused Syrup
‚ÄúI recently tried Craft Elixir‚Äôs ginger flavored syrup since they were out of my favorite simple syrup. I think I accidentally found a new favorite. The combination of ginger and THC calms my perma-fussy stomach really well. I can dissolve a micro-dose (<5mg) of the elixir in some hot water and sip it for mild nausea and anxiety relief ‚Äì all without a detectable high.‚Äù ‚Äì Bailey, Leafly Editor

For Hiking, Exercise, and Getting Out¬†
Product: The Rig Stick
Type: Portable Dab Pen
‚ÄúI‚Äôm really impressed by The Rig Stick. In my opinion, it‚Äôs a way easier method of dabbing on-the-go than a Nectar Collector or small rig. It requires no water but it doesn‚Äôt taste or feel like doing a dry dab at all!‚Äù ‚Äì Randi, Budtender
Product: Pioneer Nuggets‚Äô Lodi Dodi
Type: High-THC Flower, Hybrid
‚ÄúLodi Dodi by Pioneer Nuggets is my go-to workout strain. A bowl or two before suiting up, and by the time I hit the treadmill my limbs are buzzing with a complementary physical energy. Lodi Dodi adequately hazes my mind alongside these lightening physical effects, allowing the music to transport me into ‚ÄòThe Zone.‚Äô This strain makes the repetition of running in place significantly more enjoyable, and its physical effects seem to improve my overall endurance.‚Äù¬†‚Äì Jeremiah, Leafly Strain Researcher
Product: Headlight‚Äôs GG4 (f.k.a Gorilla Glue #4) 
Type: Vape Pen Cartridge
‚ÄúHeadlight‚Äôs GG (f.k.a. Gorilla Glue) vape cartridge is great for a busy weekend. Simple and potent dosing make it easy to dial in your effects and its flavor profile stays true to the flower. A couple puffs create an uplifting, focused buzz, perfect before a workout. The pungent, piney flavors will draw you back, and after a few more puffs it‚Äôs time to curl up with a good book or the latest episodes of Planet Earth.‚Äù¬†‚Äì Will, Leafly Digital Content Producer

What‚Äôs the weekend have in store for you? Let us know what we should check out next!
Check Out More¬†Cannabis Products

articles.title: Tips for Growing Golden Goat Cannabis
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Ever wanted to grow your favorite strain? Leafly and Botanicare¬†are teaming up on a series of grow guides that will equip you with all the tips and tricks you need to grow different strains successfully.

Strain Overview: The sativa-dominant Golden Goat gives an energetic, cerebral high that can be intimidating for new users. It‚Äôs a clone-only strain that was accidentally produced by crossing Hawaiian Romulan with Island Sweet Skunk. A popular strain in Colorado, Golden Goat is best known for its strong fruity smell and high THC content.
Grow Techniques: Grow this plant with lots of space for the roots, as they like to stretch and grow big. Golden Goat is a branchy plant, making it ideal for a SOG (sea of green) if you put in the time to train the plant. If growing indoors, allow for stretch.
Flowering Time: 9-10 weeks
Yield: Moderate
Grow Difficulty: Moderate
Climate: Prefers warm temperatures between 70-80 degrees Fahrenheit
Indoor/Outdoor: In a warm climate, grow Golden Goat outdoors in a big pot to see the plant truly take off. When growing indoors, be sure to give your plants plenty of space.
Feeding: Moderate feeding should be adequate. Bud development can be kicked into full gear toward the end of the season by allowing for cooler temperatures and letting the roots receive plenty of oxygen.
